H

HashAlgorithm - Enum in com.binaryheart.common.security
PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2) algorithms singleton.
hashPassword(String) - Static method in class com.binaryheart.common.security.PasswordUtils
Hashes a given password string It uses the default HashAlgorithm which is "PBKDF2WITHHMACSHA256".
hashPassword(String, HashAlgorithm) - Static method in class com.binaryheart.common.security.PasswordUtils
Hash a password string based on the given algorithm from HashAlgorithm.

I

InvalidHashException - Exception in com.binaryheart.common.exception
This exception is thrown when a hash algorithm is not found or illegally defined in the code when creating or getting an instance of MessageDigest or SecureRandom classes.
InvalidHashException() - Constructor for exception com.binaryheart.common.exception.InvalidHashException
Default constructor
InvalidHashException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.binaryheart.common.exception.InvalidHashException
Constructor wiht Throwable parameter

P

PasswordUtils - Class in com.binaryheart.common.security
PasswordUtils is a fast, simple, and lightweight utility class containing series of methods for creating, comparing, hashing and random generating secure passwords to be stored on database or used for other purposes.

S

SeedAlgorithm - Enum in com.binaryheart.common.security
Seed algorithms singleton.

verifyPassword(String, String) - Static method in class com.binaryheart.common.security.PasswordUtils
Verifies a provided raw password (in plaintext, unsalted and not hashed) by salting and hashing it and comparing it to a target value (usually coming from database).
